name: Agent Kater
quote: "When Kater sleeps, it's safe... But when they awaken..." "You named your cat, 'Cat'?"
abilities:
Every time a Creature attack is launched against your Movie, Agent Kater gains an additional +1 Defense.

'Animal' — Can only use 'Clothing' Props.
title: Awake

name: The Sweetest Girl
quote: "Scheming halted! Must... pet the dog first."
abilities:
Tip during an attack — Give the current attack -5 Attack Strength.

Animal — May only use 'Clothing' Props.
title: Innocent

name: Alpaca
quote: "Yeah! I'm an alpaca again! ... Wait..."
abilities:
Animal — May only use 'Clothing' Props.

Ignores the Prop Limit. May also carry 'Treasure' Props, but 'Treasure' Props on the Alpaca lose any Abilities while on them.
title: Groove

name: Palacio Del Inka Hotel
quote: "So luxurious that even the ghosts of Incan emperors refuse to check out!"
abilities: If they are not already, you can "Check In" a Character at the Palacio for 1 Popcorn to give them +1 Defense. They remain "Checked In" until they are no longer at the Palacio.
title: Luxury

name: Crystal Skull
quote: "Shiny, mysterious, and probably cursed!"
abilities: When the Skull comes into play, choose one: Either it's -2 Defense and 'Cursed' (— Can be played in another Movie; cannot be moved normally between Characters) OR it's a 'Treasure' for 2 Defense, worth 4 Points at the end of the game.
title: Skull

name: Native Glow-Up
quote: "H-how do I look? I can't see very well without my glasses..." "You? Wow---"
abilities: Attach to a NON-'Native' 'Female' Character to grant her the Trait 'Native' and +2 Defense.
title: Makeover

name: Action Librarian
quote: "It belongs IN A LIBRARY!"
abilities: You may discard the "Bookish Girl With No Boyfriend" from play at any time to play the Librarian for free. All 'Books' in her Movie gain +1 Defense OR +2 Defense if she is at a 'School' or 'Mortuary' Location OR +3 Defense if she is at any "Library".
title: Book

name: Who
quote: "Who's on first?" "Yes." "As in... Doctor?" "Who?" "Yes!" "No." "What??"
abilities: Once per turn you may force Who to become the Victim of an attack or the target of any Special Effect played against your Movie.
title: First

name: Special Effects Artist
quote: "Hold still! If I *actually* slit your throat it'd be practically unintentional!"
abilities:
Pay 2 Popcorn — You may give a Creature Trait from among the Creatures in any Graveyard to a Character currently in play (but not its Abilities).

Crew — May not be targeted by attacks or use Props.
title: Bloody

name: Backdrop Studio
quote: "Eh, we'll fix it in post." "This is ALL post..."
abilities: When Backdrop Studio comes into play, it becomes a complete copy of any Location card currently in play. However, once per turn, on your turn you may change it to any other Location card currently in play.
title: Green

name: Manos' Hand of Fate
quote: "The Master will now decide your fate!" "Oh yeah? Him and what budget?"
abilities: Discard the Hand from play — Look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is the number of Characters cast in your Opponents' Movies. You may reveal one and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your Deck in any order.
title: Hand

name: Unscrupulous Lawyer
quote: "Concerning your DMCA claim: I refer you to the response of Arkell v. Pressdram."
abilities:
3 Popcorn, Tip — Stop a Special Effect as it's being played. It is discarded.

Crew — May not be targeted by attacks or use Props.
title: Objection

name: Union Rep
quote: "The real hero? The one who protects your pension and residuals!"
abilities:
When calculating the Final Score, the Rep's Printed Defense = the number of Characters in your Movie.

Crew — Cannot be targeted by attacks or use Props.
title: Represent

name: Determined Aristocrat Gel
quote: "Don't forget that I am paying for this expedition!"
abilities:
When the Gel is cast in your Movie, put three Popcorn tokens on her. You may spend these tokens at any time just like you would Popcorn.

Tip one of your Characters with a Popcorn Bucket — Place a Popcorn token on the Gel.
title: Riches

name: Well-Meaning Scientist
quote: "The jungle isn't so bad if you get past the mosquitoes, humidity, heat, wild animals..."
abilities: If at a 'Scientific' Location, Defense = 3 and all 'Treasures' at that Location are at +1 Defense.
title: Method

name: Token Exotic Woman
quote: "So... where is she from?" "Around."
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for every other NON-'Native' Character in the same Movie.
title: Title Word

name: Make a Distraction
quote: "What the hell was that??"
abilities: Knock out all Tipped Characters in a single Movie.
title: Explosion

name: Barrel of Monkeys
quote: "What was that sound in the kitchen?"
abilities:
Instead of claiming a Victim, you may force that Movie's Director to discard their hand.

'Swarm' — 'Weapon' Props cannot defend against the Monkeys.
title: Ape

name: Man Eating Plant
quote: "The dude sure looks like plant food to me!"
abilities: If the Plant is successful, after the attack is resolved it is shuffled back into the Deck.
title: Feed

name: Cold Fish Who Comes Around
quote: “I wouldn’t be seen with you if you were the last person ali… oh just kiss me already!”
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for each non-Native ‘Male’ in play.
title: Pain

name: Witch Doctor
quote: “And he said, ‘Oo, ee, oo, ah-ah’.”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to triple the current Strength of a ‘Native’ or ‘Supernatural’ Attack.
title: Mystery

name: Bananas
quote: “Classic prat fall potential.”
abilities:
'Food' — Discard from play to draw a card.

Discard from play to Knock Out target Character or stop one "Gorilla", "Ape", or "Monkey" attack.
title: Slip

name: Pipe
quote: “It makes you look distinguished.” “What does? Lung cancer?”
abilities: Grants the Trait 'Smart' to its bearer.
title: Smoke

name: Alien Spaceship
quote: "The latest in interstellar travel!"
abilities: You may discard the Alien Spaceship to take an 'Alien' Location from your Deck and play it into your Movie.
title: Interstellar

name: Musical Score
quote: [Music Intensifies]
abilities: Draw three cards. Every other Player draws 1 card.
title: Notes

name: Jungle Vines
quote: "Wait... wait... I got an idea!"
abilities: Discard from play to Knock Out target Character OR give the current attack -5 Attack Strength.
title: Swing

name: Take a Hostage
quote: "Take them! They'll be useful..."
abilities: Attach a Character from another Movie face-down under one of your Location cards. Their Printed Defense only counts towards your final score. If a Player successfully Duels or Brawls against that Location and decides to Rescue them, or if the Location is discarded, they go back to their Movie.
title: Trapped

name: Escape Attempt
quote: "We're busting you out!"
abilities: Rescue a Character imprisoned by "Take a Hostage" and return them to their Movie.
title: Break

name: Native Chief’s Daughter
quote: "Did we forget to rescue her, *again*?"
abilities: You must have at least one 'Male' in play or the Native Chief's Daughter is discarded.
title: Capture

name: Native Chieftain
quote: "Chief say ‘Oh yeah? Your hat pretty stupid looking, too!’."
abilities: Gains +2 Defense for every other 'Native' Character in the same Movie.
title: Head

name: Rich Fish Out of Water
quote: "Lovey, how many suitcases full of money should we take on this three hour tour?"
abilities: When the Rich Fish comes into play, draw 5 cards, and attach them face-down under him. You may look at them at any time. They do not count toward your hand size, nor may you use them to generate Popcorn, but you may play them as though they were part of your hand.
title: Jewel

name: Sarcophagus
quote: "What’s the big deal? It’s just a stone box full of dead guy."
abilities:
Defense = 5 if in a 'Mortuary' or a "Museum".

Defense = -5 against 'Vampire' attacks or against a "Mummy".
title: Abode

name: Xtlpxctl the Volcano God
quote: "The volcano must be appeased… you're sure she's a virgin?"
abilities: Kill one Character from any Movie. If the Character sacrificed is 'Female', you may draw two cards.
title: Fire

name: Customs Trouble
quote: "I told you they’d never believe the sarcophagus was your Uncle Morty’s coffin!"
abilities: Knock Out all 'Treasures' in one Movie.
title: Trouble

name: Second Wind
quote: "It’s not the years, it’s the mileage."
abilities: Play on your turn to take a Character out of your Graveyard and play them in your Movie, Knocked Out.
title: Exhausted
